description: This file defines the OttPermissionCache class, which implements a thread-safe in-memory cache for OTT permissions keyed by application ID. It provides singleton access, cache management methods (update, invalidate, clear, check existence, size), and maintains an internal map with mutex locking for thread safety.

classes.name: OttPermissionCache
classes.description: A singleton class implementing a thread-safe, in-memory cache for OTT permissions, managing permissions associated with application IDs. Provides methods to get, update, invalidate, clear, and check cache entries.

methods.name: Instance
methods.description: Returns a reference to the singleton instance of OttPermissionCache.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves a copy of the permissions vector cached for the provided appId.

methods.name: UpdateCache
methods.description: Replaces or creates the cached permissions for a given appId with the provided list.

methods.name: Invalidate
methods.description: Removes the cached permissions for the specified appId.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears the entire cache of all appId permissions.

methods.name: Has
methods.description: Checks if a cache entry exists for the given appId.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Returns the number of cached application IDs.
